summary: This is an email chain from December 6, 2018, between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel discussing the flood of news about Jeffrey Epstein and referencing a specific NBC News article about lawmakers demanding a probe into his 'sweetheart deal'. The correspondence includes a request about whether a USAO number has been assigned to an Epstein-related matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain and news alerts; described as a 'sex offender' with a 'sweetheart deal' that lawmakers are demanding be probed.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein news flood
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel exchange emails noting a flood of Epstein-related news and share a link to an NBC News article about lawmakers demanding a probe.

keyFacts: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel had a Google Alert set up for 'everything Epstein-related' and noted a flood of news in early December 2018.
The emails reference an NBC News article titled 'Lawmakers demand probe into sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's 'sweetheart deal''.
An internal question is asked about whether a USAO (U.S. Attorney's Office) number has been assigned to an Epstein-related matter, suggesting internal tracking of the case.
